title: Menaruyeh
text: Menaruyeh (, also <a href="Romanize">Romanize</a>d as Menārūyeh) is a village in <a href="Ahmadabad%20Rural%20District%20%28Firuzabad%20County%29">Ahmadabad Rural District</a>, in the <a href="Central%20District%20%28Firuzabad%20County%29">Central District</a> of <a href="Firuzabad%20County">Firuzabad County</a>, <a href="Fars%20Province">Fars Province</a>, <a href="Iran">Iran</a>. At the 2006 census, its population was 177, in 40 families.
